text: Maurizio Noci (10 August 1937 â€“ 22 December 2019) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Italian Chamber of Deputies, the Italian Senate and an undersecretary in the Ministry of Agriculture and Forests. He was the mayor of Crema from 1975 to 1979. Noci was born in Crema. He was a member of the Italian Socialists. Noci died on 22 December 2019 in Crema at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Chamber of Deputies page *Official Senate page Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian mayors Category:Politicians from Lombardy Category:People from Crema, Lombardy
title: Maurizio Noci
